actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958, as amended, to authorize the establishment of a class of commuter air carriers, to provide for issuance of certificates of public convenience and necessity to members of that class who may apply therefor, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Commuter Air Carrier Act - Authorizes the establishment of a class of commuter air carriers. Provides for issuance of certificates of public convenience and necessity to members of that class who may apply therefor. Prohibits competitive commuter air carrier services between points served by the holder of a certificates unless there is a need in the public interest for such competition.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958, as amended, to authorize the establishment of a class of commuter air carriers, to provide for issuance of certificates of public convenience and necessity to members of that class who may apply therefor, and for other purposes.
